title.rendered: Spreading Smiles at the Tata Mumbai Marathon

content.rendered: Hundreds of volunteers and supporters came together and joined Smile Foundation at the Tata Mumbai Marathon to support the Shiksha Na Ruke initiative. Teams from Knight Frank India Private Limited, Diversey India Hygiene Private Limited, CBC Corporation India Pvt. Ltd., and Evonik India Pvt. Ltd. enthusiastically matched steps with employees and volunteers from Smile Foundation to support the cause of child education at the marathon.
